mapper.select: select @rank := @rank + 1 as ranking, no, name, thumbnail from game where platform = #{platform} and (@rank := 0) = 0 order by reviews desc, rating desc limit 10;
select count(*) from game where platform=#{platform}
select @rank := @rank + 1 as ranking, no, name, thumbnail from game where platform = #{platform} and (@rank := 0) = 0 order by reviews desc, rating desc
select rank() over(order by reviews desc, rating desc) as ranking, no, name, thumbnail from game where platform = #{platform} limit #{skip},9;
select distinct genre from genre, (select * from wishlist where member_id = #{member_id}) as wishlist where genre.game_no = wishlist.game_no;
select distinct genre from genre order by genre
select distinct genre.genre from genre, (select no from game where platform = #{platform}) game where genre.game_no = game.no order by genre.genre;
